item.title: Pondicherry - Last French Colony
item.description: LIFE IS SOMETHING WE ALL ARE SCARED OF. I have been to Pondicherry twice. Once with my friend and band’s drummer, Ankit Godle and next time with my friends from Bangalore. Both time from I travelled from Bangalore, once by bus and next time taking a self-driving car. The first time I visited was in 2016, when I visited Chennai to meet Ankit for a new song composition. On reaching Chennai we thought to visit Pondicherry and so made a spontaneous plan and took a bus to Pondicherry.
